A true relation of the cruelties and barbarities of the French upon the English prisoners of war being a journal of their travels from Dinan in Britany, to Thoulon in Provence, and back again ... / faithfully and impartially performed by Richard Strutton, being an eye-witness, and a fellow sufferer. Strutton, Richard.
[4], 57, [3] p.
Printed for Richard Baldwin ..., London : 1690.
"Licens'd June 27, 1690. James Fraser" Advertisement: [3] p. at end. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
=======

Strutton, Richard.
[4], 57, [3] p.
